response.overview: After the Ice, the Deluge figures relationships between the melting polar ice caps and other traumatised, abject, alien, and outsider bodies – queering the question of survival towards less boundaried ways of being in crisis.  The film is constituted of Super 8; VHS, iPhone and 16mm film footage and performance documentation shot in the Arctic Circle on a 2019 research trip; as well as archival 16mm ​‘nature’ documentaries.
response.title: After the Ice, the Deluge
